content.body:
This article explains how to subscribe new customers and how to add services to existing customer entities.  
partner portal Click **Actions…** next to the desired sub\-account and click **Add service**, then proceed to step 4.





To add services to customer entities:





1. Click **Knowledge Graph** in the navigation bar and click **Entities**.
2. Select the checkbox next to the entity or entities you would like to add services for.
3. Click on the **More Actions** button and select **Add Services**.
4. Select the checkbox next to the desired service and click **Continue**.




   * Partner Portal: If the sub\-account you select has more than one entity, select the checkbox next to the entities you would like to add services to.





5. Click **Continue** at the bottom of the page.




   * Note: There is no immediate charge when you place the request. Charges are billed according to your agreement. Reach out to your Client Success Manager if you have questions regarding pricing.

helpstarter_helpArticleBodyMarkdown.markdown:
This article explains how to subscribe new customers and how to add services to existing customer entities.

partner portal

Click Actions… next to the desired sub-account and click Add service, then proceed to step 4.

To add services to customer entities:

  1. Click Knowledge Graph in the navigation bar and click Entities.
  2. Select the checkbox next to the entity or entities you would like to add services for.
  3. Click on the More Actions button and select Add Services.
  4. Select the checkbox next to the desired service and click Continue.

    • Partner Portal: If the sub-account you select has more than one entity, select the checkbox next to the entities you would like to add services to.

  5. Click Continue at the bottom of the page.
    • Note: There is no immediate charge when you place the request. Charges are billed according to your agreement. Reach out to your Client Success Manager if you have questions regarding pricing.

content.name: Add Services to Customer Entities
